Summary: Taking random pictures of the sky, as before and discovered the object at about three o'clock. When zoomed in on, it shows detail.
divs: Sighting DetailsI've been taking random pictures in front of my house, which faces NNW with a digital camera now for about two months. There was a lot of UFO activity at first, but for the past several weeks, nothing has shown up until today. I did not notice the object until I loaded the pictures on my computer. It is very obvious at the three o'clock position. If you zoom in on the object, it shows detail. There also appears to be a white round object near the right bottom just above the date.
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Winston-Salem
There was one other sighting in Winston-Salem on or around December 21st 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
